title: Trade Spotlight | What should you do with Indiabulls Housing Finance, Skipper, Man Industries on Friday? - Moneycontrol
content: Trade Spotlight | What should you do with Indiabulls Housing Finance, Skipper, Man Industries on Friday?  Moneycontrol
description: On daily and weekly charts, Skipper has formed double bottom formation. Post short term correction, the stock took the support near Rs 55 and bounced back sharply.
